strapiPost.title: NWA Thrift Store Wins Purple Ribbon Award
strapiPost.content:
The Northwest Arkansas Women’s Shelter Thrift Store recently won a national award for “Outstanding Thrift Shop of the Year.” 

  • Award: The NWA thrift store won a 2022 Purple Ribbon Award, selected by a national panel of respected professionals in the field of domestic violence. The Purple Ribbon Awards are the “first comprehensive awards program honoring members of the domestic violence movement.”
  • Celebrate: For over 20 years, the NWA Women’s Shelter Thrift Store has been a key source for programs offered to women, men, and children in our community. The store is located at 1622 S 8th St in Rogers and will celebrate its award on September 19 from 9-5p by offering special sales, treats, and more.
